title: I caught a wild Lee Sin stealing my red
body: He Q's to the krugs so i chase after him, only to have him ward jump to a ward on the other side of the wall so I activate my ult and run after him. When finally catch up, he kicks me back half a screen with his click and point no counterplay ult. By the time I catch him again all his low cooldown spells are up again and his gay homeboys are there to back him up. But hey, we can't nerf Lee Sin any further because he is balanced and  muh skillshots and muh lategame give him a meaningful weakness so it's none of my business.
